frame.name: Biological_urge
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Experiencer</fen> is in a <fen>State</fen> where a biological urge is signaling the need to perform a certain action such as eating, drinking, stopping exertion, sleeping, regurgitating, or having sex. The <fen>Duration</fen>, <fen>Time</fen>, <fen>Place</fen>, or <fen>Degree</fen> of intensity associated with the occurrence of the urge may also be indicated. In this frame, the <fen>Experiencer</fen> does not necessarily want to perform the action that would fulfill the urge, and there is no specific focus associated with the urge.
<ex><fex name="Experiencer">Mike</fex> <m>feels</m> <t>hungry</t>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Experiencer">Sam</fex> <m>was</m> <t>thirsty</t> <fex name="Time">after dinner</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Degree</fen> identifies the extent to which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> receives the biological signal.</def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Experiencer</fen> receives the biological signal and possesses the internal experience which is a reaction to the phsyical signal. <ex><fex name="Exp">Mr. Burns</fex> <m>was</m> sexually <t>aroused</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Experiencer</fen> feels the biological signal. <fen>Time</fen> may also allow inference about the <fen>Reason</fen> for the biological urge. <ex><fex name="Experiencer">I</fex> <m>am</m> <t>exhausted</t> <fex name="Time">when I babysit</fex>.</ex> In such cases, we tag <fen>Reason</fen> on the second layer.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> is where the <fen>Experiencer</fen> feels the biological signal.</def-root>

FE.name: Expressor
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Expressor</fen> is used for a gesture, expression, or body part indicating that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is feeling a certain urge.
<ex>He gave me a <t>tired</t> <fex name="Expressor">shrug</fex> and then looked down again.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Duration</fen> identifies the amount of time for which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> feels the urge.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Explanation</fen> for which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> has the biological urge. <ex><fex name="Experiencer">Jen</fex> <m>is</m> <t>tired</t> <fex name="Exp">because she gave birth last night.</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: State
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>State</fen> identifies the <fen>Experiencer</fen>'s state of being. <ex>She was alarmed by John's <t>hungry</t> <fex name = "State">state</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Parameter
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Parameter</fen> is the particular biological realm in which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> feels the urge. <ex>Mr. Burns <m>was</m> <fex name = "Parameter">sexually</fex> <t>aroused</t>.</ex></def-root>
